content:
Welcome! I am a PhD Candidate in Economics at CEMFI.
My main field of research is development economics. My current work focuses on technology adoption and contractual frictions in Sub-Saharan Africa. My projects have received funding from STEG and PEDL.
Outside of academics, I love playing lacrosse and growing the game in Europe (and beyond).
My CV is available here .
